title: Bus torched in Dhaka's North Badda
body: Miscreants set a bus on fire in Dhaka's North Badda area on Sunday night. Nasirul Islam, officer-in-charge (OC) of Badda Police Station, said a bus of Asim Paribahan was torched around 8:30pm. No casualties were reported, and no one has been detained in this connection so far, the OC added. Earlier on Friday night, a moving bus of Dewan Paribahan was set on fire on the Badda Link Road. No casualties or arrests were reported in that incident either.
